section.title: EVMEventList
section.para: EVMEventList returns the list of policy event IDs and names defined for a given policy. If policyId is an asterisk ("*"), all, or none, the method returns all events.

listitem.para: Input: The ID of a policy. If policyId is an asterisk ("*"), all, or none, the output includes all conditions.
Output: VmdbwsSupport..EventListArray. Each VmdbwsSupport..EventList contains the list of conditions for the policyid.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EVMEventList usage:

example.title: EVMEventList WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="EVMEventList"> <part name="policyGuid" type="xsd:string" /> </message> <message name="EVMEventListResponse"> <part name="return" type="typens:VmdbwsSupport..EventListArray" /> </message> ... <xsd:complexType name="VmdbwsSupport..EventList"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="guid" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType>

example.title: EVMEventList Output (Java)
example.screen:
